title: The role of solution temperature in characteristics of TiO2 nanotube arrays prepared on Ti foil in acid solution
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8790-8800
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00875H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wenhao Xian, Yingjie Liu, Qingjie Qi, Han Liu, Yue Wang, Changbin Chen
The barrier layer thickness of the TNTs decrease with the solution temperature rises from −10 °C to 90 °C; the pulse temperature has an evident effect on the characteristics of TNTs in the case of two fixed temperatures.
